description:
Takahashi Minato always cooks for his friends in Edel Rose`s kitchen. However, one day he suddenly goes home. His mother who runs an inn has injured herself, and as the eldest son, Minato must look after his siblings. Without Minato, the remaining students of Edel Rose realize just how much they appreciate having him around.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Takahashi Minato: Kokoro wa Ookki na Taiheiyou
Takahashi Minato: My Heart Is an Ocean
鷹梁ミナト 心は大っきな太平洋
